content.raw:
This is a good start, but I would also propose moving the updateSingleAabb call into the ClearCollisionCache function. Further, I have tested without removing and re-adding the shape and it works fine. I think they say that in the documentation just to be safe, but it's not actually necessary.

I've commited my proposed changes in e2f6ee2 (branch bullet_scale_scpeters) and verified that the test still passes. Please consider merging with that branch.
